content: Posting #14467 here since it's a very large change that will likely rot quickly and interferes with other of my PRs
This should be almost entirely uncontroversial. I got carried away and did some golfing on the side, but if anyone thinks that might cause some controversy, I'll gladly put that on another PR
I should mention, #14432 will clash with this. They can be merged in any order, but that PR is much, much smaller, so...
